content.title: Incredible Milestone! $1,500,000 in 4 Days – Thanks You!
content.creator:
Xphotonics
February 15, 2025
content.content:
As I write this update, my palms are literally sweating! We can’t believe it—we have surpassed $1,500,000 in just 4 days! Everyone in our lab is beyond grateful—thank you so much for your support!
This isn’t just our dream coming true—it’s a miracle we created together! Our mission is twofold: to provide laser solutions for professionals worldwide and to build a strong, passionate community for welders, where everyone can share experiences, exchange skills, and grow together! Your enthusiasm and support are turning this vision into reality!
Now, we need your help! Please spread the word—tell your friends, family, or share on social media so more people can see how laser innovation is transforming industries and they can be part of it right now!
And here’s a special surprise! 🎁 We will soon reveal an exclusive gift for our backers—stay tuned!
Once again, thank you for your incredible support—it means the world to us!🔥

comments.text: I know saying "soon" is just because you aren't sure when yet, but could you give us just a ball park guess when "soon" might be?
Hi Z The exclusive stretch goal unlocks have been posted on the page. Feel free to check it out! Thank you
Hmmm wonder what the special gift is 🤔
We will announce it in our next update soon! 💗
Please allow us to buy multiple rewards.

Thank you for your support! 💙 To purchase multiple XLASERLAB products, you can use the Add-Ons option when selecting your reward. Additionally, due to Kickstarter’s platform limit, each backer can pledge up to $10,000 per account. If you'd like to pledge more, you can create a new Kickstarter account to place another order. We truly appreciate your enthusiasm and support! We hope XLASERLAB’s laser welder helps bring out the best in your creations. 🚀✨
Joshua de Lisle's video on YouTube convinced me. Really excited to try laser welding 👍🏻

Thank you to Joshua for his detailed review of our product! And a big thank you to you for joining our journey to explore the possibilities of laser welding! If you have any questions, feel free to leave a comment! 😊
